Topic: (Waiting for her real person to fact check) A conversation between brother Lai Wing Lam (translit.) and me.

手足 - brother- lit. hands and legs, it is a gender neutral term and used to describe people without blood relationship but are close to another as important as one's limbs.


It began when I saw the incident regarding with a female body corpse finding at South Horizons
After this I have uploaded brother Lai's photo onto Facebook group,
Trying to find further updates regarding with her.
Brother has messaged me 15 minutes after I have posted, at 18:57

Images of conversation has been captured as below with every single word captured.

對話圖如下: 一字不漏cap曬


She said she will clarify this herself on LIHKG,
Let's wait until she appears in person to clarify,
This is all the information I could provide.

ps - I was not acquainted with brother
If this turns out to be wrong (Lai Wing Lam is really not the body found), I hope everyone will try to see if anyone around you has gone missing.


(A brief description on the images - Lai Wing Lam who was suspected to be the identity of the corpse found around South Horizon today has personally messaged the uploader of this post on Facebook, she clarifies that she is not the corpse and has not been released. She jested a bit that she felt a bit embarrassed to see her photo being posted around as frequently as Ho Kwan Yiu's portrait. She later went on saying she will try to clarify this on LIHKG with her boyfriend's account.)

Topic: Chung Gor: I have lost four years time playing on Hearthstone, If Hong Kong lost, it would be forever.


Chung Gor, Blitzchung, has shouted “liberate Hong Kong, the revolution of our times“ while being interviewed at Hearthstone's Grandsmaster competition, today (08/10) he has received Blizzard's verdict and has started live streaming the same night. Apart from telling all not to worry, he emphasises that he does not regret at all.

Blitzchung on 08/10 at night has live streamed on his Twitch channel to update his latest status. At the beginning he said the live crew unit could have stopped him on spot, but they still have let him finish. Blizzard entertainment has let the event happened and has not made contact with him proactively, only in the morning on 08/10 he has received email notifying he has been banned from competition.

When he was asked what he would do if he could not win the Grandsmaster competition on 06/10. Blizchung emphasises “there are things must be won“ and he added, “today I have lost four years time on Hearthstone, but if Hong Kong lost it would be a matter of eternity.“

https://clips.twitch.tv/RelentlessBoredPistachioM4xHeh

He has gambled his whole life career, can you all go on a strike for once for him?

Strong post leave name
LM translate after dinner

Topic: Are you fucking serious, “ Guarding Children“ has been doing practical work, fundraising for helping brothers only end up with 400 thousand?
守護孩子 - Guarding Children - please correct me if they have an official English name, it is an organisation / project initiated by Good Neighbour North District Church, who has been going into the frontline in hope of easing the tension between protesters and police force. Most members involved are elderly.


Do you remember how many brothers has “ Guarding Children“ saved on 29/09 in Admiralty?
Do you remember Old Man Chan who has went on fasting?

[Updates on fundraising by teenage administrative secretary]
Thank you God! And thank you for all your support!
Until 03/10, teenage administrative secretary has fundraised HKD 410,000.
We have now recruited 7 teenage administrative secretary who have now began working, the eighth teenage administrative secretary is still under recruit.
Again, thank you all from all walk of life supporting teenagers, giving them the opportunity to put in their best effort to return the society. Hoping all teenage administrative secretaries and the Good Neighbour North District Church could change the society together
